name: CubiCo (itch)
description:
A puzzle game where you control a businessman trying to get to an interview.

Created by Dominic Calkosz, Christopher Popham, Jack Lawrie, Augusto Iversen, and Drew Sangston, with help from Simon Perry and William Yin.

The original version, created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 42 Game Jam, can be found here.
